amendment.description: Amendment sought to to strike the Davis-Bacon provision of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 110-36 to strike the Davis-Bacon section of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baker amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 280 (Roll no. 133).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Baker.
